def_cn: (政府的)部，司，局，处;(企业的)部门，科;(大学的)系，所;(大型商店的)货品区
def_en: A department is one of the sections in an organization such as a government, business, or university. A department is also one of the sections in a large shop.

def_cn: 不是…的职责（或知识）范围;并非…的专长
def_en: If you say that a task or area of knowledge is not your department, you mean that you are not responsible for it or do not know much about it.
